structure.unit: ACQUISITION AND DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC PROJECTS THROUGH REVENUE BONDS

law.text: If the authority deems it advisable, it may further develop the museum at Churchill Downs and, in connection therewith, establish a facility and devices through which prior Kentucky Derby and other important races run at Churchill Downs may be exhibited to patrons of Churchill Downs during race meetings and to off-season tourist visitors.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.
